EEGReference: EEG: RM (right mastoid); ESG: TH6 (over 6th thoracic vertebra); ECG: ECGN (below right clavicle), ENG: (1) left Erb's Point: EPN (ref placed over right Erb's point), (2) Biceps: BicepsN (approx. 3 cm proximal to active electrode), (3) Knee: kneeMN (located approx. 3cm proximal to kneeM, all knee channels had the same reference);
InstitutionName: Max Planck Institute for Human Cognitive and Brain Sciences
TaskDescription: Participants were laying on their back. Stimulation of sensory parts of the tibial nerve stimulation at the left DI (big toe), the left DII or both (left DI and DII) simultaneously.
Instructions: Relax and try not to move. Look at the fixation cross during the recordings and blink normal.
CapManufacturer: EasyCap GmbH, Steingrabenstrasse 14, DE-82211 Herrsching, Germany
EEGGround: EEG: placed at POz, ESG: placed approx. over 9th thoracic vertebra
